name: Familiar Link
description: Creates a permanent telepathic/empathic bond between the caster and a small animal familiar. The caster gains sensory access to the familiar (see, hear, smell, taste, feel) and both parties share certain effects; if the familiar is harmed the caster may take shock and suffer consequences.
effects: Caster gains +6 hit points while link exists
If familiar is killed caster loses 10 HP and may suffer shock (coma 1-6 hours)

name: Curse: Phobia
description: Imposes an intense, irrational phobia on the target. The caster selects a specific fear (or roll randomly). The victim suffers severe phobic reactions whenever encountering the stimulus until removed by a remove curse or negation.
effects: Target gains an intense, recurring phobic reaction
Behavioral avoidance and penalties when encountering phobia
Only Remove Curse fully cures; Negation has 25% chance

name: Metamorphosis: Insect
description: Transforms the caster (or a willing target via ritual) into an insect form (spiders, beetles, etc.). The subject retains I.Q., memory and hit points but cannot cast spells while in insect form and loses human skills.
effects: Change into insect form (size limits apply)
Retains mental stats and hit points; loses ability to use speech and most human skills
Typical insect abilities: climbing, limited flight, bite/sting (nonpoisonous 1 HP or S.D.C., poisonous 1D6 damage)
